page.title: 09LEISURE IN HURST GREEN
page.content: There are quite a lot of clubs and activities for both young and old in{ {Hurst Green}. There is a Methodist youth club,where we do lots of activities, this is on Fridays.There is also another youth club held in the community centre twice a week. There are two cub packs,{Manor}and{ {Mill.}One scout troop called the{ {Wallabies}is in this area.There are also Brownies and Guides. The athletics club is held twice a week at the Mill Lane playing field. There is also a{Boxing Club}which is held three times a week at{Holland {Middle School}and at the club at{Mill {Lane;}there are also football clubs. The old people have many activities too.They have day centres and clubs in the evenings where they go to see friends or play games like{Bingo}.
